r.s: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.d: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.n: * The 'wikilinks' rule now looks for _, -, and 0-9 in front of candidate wikilinks (in addition to A-Za-z). * The 'interwiki' rule now supports described links in the format [Main:HomePage Show this text]. Thanks to Jacob Brunson at BYU for the suggestion. * The insertRule() method would add new rules as an array in themselves, instead of as a key and an array of values; this has been fixed. Thanks to Brian Tol for the bug report.
